name: Ideagen PLC
description: Ideagen PLC is a UK-based software company that specializes in providing compliance, risk management, and governance solutions. Founded in 2012, the company has rapidly established itself as a leader in the field, serving a diverse range of sectors including healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and education. Ideagen's flagship products, such as Q-Pulse and Cority, are designed to help organizations streamline their processes, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and enhance operational efficiency. The company leverages advanced technologies, including cloud computing and AI, to deliver user-friendly software solutions that empower businesses to manage their risks effectively. Ideagen is committed to innovation and continuously updates its offerings to meet the evolving needs of its clients. With a global presence and a strong focus on customer satisfaction, Ideagen aims to support organizations in achieving their governance and compliance objectives. The company’s mission is to empower organizations to manage their governance, risk, and compliance effectively, ultimately enhancing productivity and ensuring sustainable growth.
